Summary: Brite orange in color with changing speed and directions.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Ellwood City
There were no other sightings in Ellwood City on or around June 14th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving the Ellwood City Hospital when I noticed the same orange object that my wife and I witnessed last 4th of July. It made four changes in direction in a zig-zag pattern. I called my wife and was telling her about the object when it appeared to get closer and briter. Before I could tell her what was happening, it change direction one more time then started to travel higher and got dimmer to where i could no longer see it in the sky. All of this happened in about 5 minutes and the entire time it was quite and there were no extra noises like a jet engine or the sound of a prop plane or helocoptor.
